chapters.title: Prologue: Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info: Dain Bornhald, p. 17—Son of Geofram. He now commands his own troops; he also plans to avenge his father's death. He has a hatred of Perrin, since he thinks he had a hand in killing his father. After being chased from the Two Rivers, he has taken sides with Galad against the new Lord Captain Commander, Eamon Valda.
